thread.title: Beyonce's chair tip mid-performance at the Grammy Awards sends Twitter into a frenzy
thread.title_full: Beyonce's chair tip mid-performance at the Grammy Awards sends Twitter into a frenzy

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Beyonce's chair tip mid-performance at the Grammy Awards sends Twitter into a frenzy
text:
Beyonce put on a show-stopping performance at the celeb-packed Grammy Awards tonight. 
But there was one moment that really stuck out for the Twitterverse - her chair tip. 
Minutes into her performance, Beyonce, wearing a glittering gold gown and crown, took a seat on a huge wooden chair that was positioned at the end of a long table. 
The chair then tipped back so the pregnant singer was sitting horizontally with nothing to support her. Recording artist Beyonce   
As Beyonce, who announced she was expecting twins a few weeks ago, balanced precariously in the air, it appeared that every viewer at home let out a very loud gasp. 
And after the gasp, they then took to social media to share hundreds of memes and tweets. 
Echoing what everyone else was thinking, one fan wrote: "Can you imagine being in charge of tipping a pregnant Beyonce backwards?" 
Alongside a picture of the chair tipped backwards, another joked: "Swiping through Bumble looking for a girl who will support me like this chair supports Beyonce." 
While others told her to never pull such a scary stunt again. 
"It was breathtaking but don't ever. EVER. lean back in no damn chair like that ever. again. @beyonce . I'm not playing with you," a die-hard fan shared. 
But two people who definitely won't be making memes out of the star are husband Jay Z and adorable Blue Ivy. 
As she finished her show-stopping performance of ballads Love Drought and Sandcastles, cameras panned to her husband Jay Z who was giving her a standing ovation and adorable daughter Blue who was also clapping her mum.     Blue Ivy Carter and Jay Z   
And viewers were also flooding Twitter with praise for the star, saying it was one of her most "beautiful" performances to date. 
"Beyonce was serving pregnant goddess realness and I was living!" said one, while another joked, "Was I just baptised I think I was!"
